ModMetaData.name: Lord of the Rims - Ents (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Saebbi and Napon
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of Saebbi and Napons mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1407085855
- Added support for Combat Extended - Fixed starting goodwill with Empire
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/LordoftheRimsEnts][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img]
Adds Ents to RimWorld. Requires JecsTools and Humanoid Alien Framework.
Textures were made by Napon. XML done by Saebbi.
Regeneration Assembly by ChJees, Texture for Blood by Filthy Peasant.
